resources.string: This application is intended to be used as a personal travel journal. You can record new travel experiences, view existing travel experiences, view interesting travel facts from a database of my creation, and view an RSS feed about world news. You can also add your own travel facts to the database as you learn from your travels!If you would like to report any bugs or comment on my application, you can contact me at drake.gens@gmail.com
World News RSS Feed from BBC
